page.title: 11BROWNIES
page.content: BROWNIES The fourth Burbage Brownies are a very friendly pack we meet every Monday at Sketchley Hill School.At Brownie meetings we come in,take off ourcoats and go to our corners. The pack is divided into four groups called sixes lead by a sixer. Our sixes are called the Gnomes,the Elves, the Sprites and the Imps.Each six tries to win points by dressing and behaving correctly and working hard.The six with the most points over six weeks wins the shield for next six weeks. Our leaders give us the points, then we play a game.This is followed by Brownie ring where we pay twenty pence subs,then often this is followed by craft with felt.Sometimes we go for walks or go swimming.
